Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.classic

Class ClassicHelper<X>

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.sort.classic.ClassicHelper<X>
Type Parameters:
X - the type of elements managed by this helper class.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Helper<X>, Instrument, NonComparableHelper<X>, AutoCloseable, Comparator<X>
public class ClassicHelper<X> extends Object implements NonComparableHelper<X>
The ClassicHelper class provides an implementation of the NonComparableHelper interface, which in turn implements Helper, and is designed to assist sorting operations and other utilities for non-comparable types, with support for instrumenting various actions like swaps, comparisons, and more. This class uses an external comparator for comparing elements.

    • ClassicHelper

      public ClassicHelper(String description, Comparator<X> comparator, int n, Random random, Config config)
      Constructor for explicit random number generator.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of this Helper (for humans).
      comparator - a comparator for comparing X values.
      n - the number of elements expected to be sorted. The field n is mutable so can be set after the constructor.
      random - a random number generator.
